mapper.select: SELECT a.id_room , a.id_org , a.na_room , a.des_room , a.pic_room , a.fg_active , a.fg_valid , a.sort , a.creator , a.gmt_create , a.operator , a.gmt_modify , count(1) AS deviceNum FROM erp_room a LEFT JOIN erp_room_device b ON a.id_room = b.id_room WHERE a.id_org = #{idOrg} GROUP BY a.id_room , a.id_org , a.na_room , a.des_room , a.pic_room , a.fg_active , a.fg_valid , a.sort , a.creator , a.gmt_create , a.operator , a.gmt_modify limit #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT count(1) FROM erp_room WHERE id_org = #{idOrg}
